comment.author: 7676448@N08
comment._content:
The spacecraft pictured is  Spacecraft 012  a Block 1 spacecraft  better known as  Apollo 1 which burned on the launch pad with the crew aboard.
The photographs on the placard on top of the spacecraft are Virgil  "Gus" Grissom, Edward White II and Roger Chaffee, the prime crew killed on January 27th 1967
